item.title: 对涉嫌黑客攻击雪花公司客户的指控解封
item.description: 对涉嫌对 Snowflake Inc.【原文：Charges were unsealed against two men suspected of carrying out cyberattacks against customers of Snowflake Inc., providing new details about the breaches.】

item.title: Grab 在季度盈利超过预期后上调了业绩预测
item.description: Grab Holdings Ltd.上调了今年的盈利预期，此前该公司的季度利润超过了预期，原因是该公司削减了成本，以应对东南亚打车和快递市场激烈竞争的影响。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. raised its earnings forecast for the year after quarterly profit topped estimates, helped by cost cuts to tackle the effects of intense competition in Southeast Asia’s ride-hailing and delivery markets.】

item.title: 特朗普交易势头强劲，亚洲投资者表现谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 美国股市连续第五个交易日上涨，比特币突破88,000美元，美元创下一年新高，因为投资者继续押注这些交易将受益于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的议程。亚洲股市的开局较为谨慎。【原文：US stocks rose for a fifth straight session, while Bitcoin topped $88,000 and the dollar hit a one-year high as investors continued to bet those trades will benefit from President-elect Donald Trump’s agenda. Asian shares were set for a more cautious start.】

item.title: 银行家认为香港首次公开募股回暖将缓解亚洲交易荒
item.description: 在经历了几年的低迷之后，亚洲的银行家们看到了首次公开募股复苏的迹象。【原文：After a lean couple of years, bankers in Asia are seeing signs of a recovery in initial public offerings.】

item.title: 特朗普赢得大选后，Threads、Bluesky 用户激增
item.description: 自美国大选之夜以来，Threads 和 Bluesky 这两个与埃隆-马斯克的 X 非常相似的社交网络迎来了大量新用户，因为在唐纳德-特朗普赢得总统大选后，人们开始寻求马斯克的更右倾平台的替代品。【原文：Threads and Bluesky, rival social networks that look a lot like Elon Musk’s X, have seen an influx of new users since election night in the US as people seek alternatives to Musk’s more right-leaning platform following Donald Trump’s presidential victory.】

item.title: Interactive Brokers 创始人称预测市场提供 "理性 "答案
item.description: 零售经纪商互动经纪集团公司（Interactive Brokers Group Inc.【原文：Prediction markets have “enormous” growth potential, Thomas Peterffy, the billionaire founder of the retail brokerage Interactive Brokers Group Inc., said in the wake of the firm’s success during the US presidential election.】

item.title: 邻国解体，秘鲁准备应对玻利维亚移民潮
item.description: 秘鲁当局正密切关注邻国玻利维亚的情况，该国潜在的经济崩溃可能会引发新一轮的地区移民潮。【原文：Peruvian authorities are keeping a wary eye on conditions in neighboring Bolivia, where a potential economic collapse could unleash a new wave of regional migration.】

item.title: 巴西对冲基金 Verde 称在特朗普获胜前就已押注比特币
item.description: 由业内资深人士路易斯-斯图尔伯格（Luis Stuhlberger）经营的巴西资金管理公司Verde Asset Management是因当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫而引发的比特币反弹的参与者之一。【原文：Verde Asset Management, the Brazilian money manager run by industry veteran Luis Stuhlberger, is among those riding the Bitcoin rally sparked by President-elect Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: 关注特朗普，债券投资者为收益率飙升做好准备
item.description: 美国国债开盘将走弱，因为投资者希望重燃唐纳德-特朗普上周赢得总统大选所引发的抛售潮。【原文：US Treasuries are set to open weaker as investors look to rekindle the selloff spurred by Donald Trump’s presidential victory last week.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔诺沃亚在选举争端中将副总统扫地出门
item.description: 作为厄瓜多尔的政治障碍，丹尼尔-诺沃亚总统撤换了他的副手，而选举当局则在二月选举前取消了一位保守派候选人的资格。【原文：President Daniel Noboa removed his second-in-command as a political obstacle in Ecuador, while electoral authorities disqualified a conservative candidate ahead of February’s election.】

item.title: 前 Alameda 联合首席执行官 Sam Trabucco 向 FTX 债权人放弃游艇和公寓
item.description: 山姆-特拉布科（Sam Trabucco）是山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）两年前在 FTX 和阿拉米达研究公司（Alameda Research）倒闭前的核心圈子成员之一，他已同意将包括游艇在内的一系列财产移交给这家倒闭的加密货币交易所的债权人。【原文：Sam Trabucco, one of Sam Bankman-Fried’s inner circle before the collapse the FTX and Alameda Research two years ago, has agree to hand over a slew of properties, including his yacht to creditors of the failed crypto exchange.】

item.title: 贝莱德推出新 ETF，瞄准货币市场基金业务
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is throwing its weight behind an early push to bring exchange-traded funds to money-market investors.】

item.title: 加拿大港口停工令特鲁多政府再次陷入困境
item.description: 商业团体敦促贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）政府结束加拿大最大港口的劳资纠纷，就像 8 月份对铁路部门所做的那样，以避免国家供应链出现混乱。【原文：Business groups are urging Justin Trudeau’s government to put an end to labor strife at Canada’s largest ports, as it did with railways in August, to avoid chaos in the country’s supply chains.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，特斯拉拥趸全力推动 3,000 亿美元集会
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选总统后，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.由于投资者对特朗普的第二个任期将给埃隆-马斯克领导的电动汽车制造商带来暴利充满信心，特斯拉的股价攀升似乎势不可挡。【原文：Tesla Inc. fans have been reinvigorated by Donald Trump’s presidential triumph. The stock’s climb has been seemingly unstoppable as investors pile into the shares, confident that a second Trump term will bring windfalls to the Elon Musk-led electric vehicle maker.】

item.title: 伤透了心 "的杠杆债券 ETF 流入创纪录
item.description: 一批 ETF 交易员正在大举押注国债，认为利率已经真正见顶。在过去的三年里，这一赌注让他们损失惨重。【原文：A cohort of ETF traders are piling into a high-octane Treasury bet that interest rates have well and truly peaked. It’s one that’s burned them over the past three years.】

item.title: Itau 基金经理在迈阿密为新的新兴市场部门招聘人员
item.description: 伊塔资产管理公司（Itau Asset Management）管理着约 1 万亿雷亚尔（1730 亿美元）的资产，该公司正在迈阿密设立一个新的新兴市场股票柜台。【原文：Itau Asset Management, which oversees about 1 trillion reais ($173 billion), is starting a new emerging-market equity desk out of Miami.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜威胁关键的公共事业税收减免政策
item.description: 随着共和党越来越接近控制白宫和国会，为市政债券投资者提供的税收减免正在受到威胁。【原文：The tax break offered to municipal bond investors is coming under threat as Republicans are closer to taking control of both the White House and Congress.】

item.title: Dynamite 集团加拿大首次公开募股目标估值 17 亿美元
item.description: 加拿大女装零售商 Groupe Dynamite Inc.首次公开募股，采用双层股票结构，估值达 23 亿加元（17 亿美元）。【原文：Canadian women’s clothing retailer Groupe Dynamite Inc. launched its initial public offering with a dual-class share structure and a valuation of C$2.3 billion ($1.7 billion), a deal that would cement its top executive as a billionaire.】

item.title: 比特币对冲基金的 "无风险交易 "又回来了
item.description: 比特币破纪录的涨势使加密货币对冲基金最受欢迎的交易之一变得比往常更加有利可图，很可能有助于推动原始数字货币达到曾经深不可测的高度。【原文：The meteoric pace of the record-breaking rally in Bitcoin is making one of the most popular trades for crypto hedge funds even more lucrative than usual, likely helping to propel the original digital currency even higher to once unfathomable heights.】

item.title: 英国计划在两年内试行发行基于区块链的吉利物
item.description: 英国计划在未来两年内开始发行数字金边债券，因为政府对技术的掌握一直比较缓慢。【原文：The UK plans to begin issuing digital gilts within the next two years, as the government latches onto technology it’s been slow to embrace.】

item.title: Onex 上调道明证券评级，剔除独角兽中性评级后股价上涨
item.description: 周一上午，加拿大投资公司 TD Cowen 将 Onex Corp. 的股票评级从 "持有 "上调至 "买入"。【原文：Onex Corp. shares are climbing after the Canadian investment firm shed its only neutral rating, with TD Cowen upgrading the stock to buy from hold Monday morning amid blockbuster credit fundraising this year.】

item.title: 放松管制的交易触及债券市场
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 据说合作伙伴将为输送带公司 Ammega 的首次公开募股挑选银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Partners Group Holding AG 已为 Ammega Group BV 潜在的首次公开募股选择了银行，这家私募股权公司正在探索这家欧洲传送带制造商的各种选择。【原文：Partners Group Holding AG has selected banks for a potential initial public offering of Ammega Group BV as the private equity firm explores options for the European conveyor-belt maker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DV Trading 聘用 Trafigura 和阿美石油公司交易员，拓展能源业务
item.description: 近几个月来，DV Trading 雇用了几名燃料和天然气交易员，以扩大其专有能源交易业务，尽管其他公司在波动性减弱的情况下放慢了该领域的招聘速度。【原文：DV Trading hired several fuel and natural gas traders in recent months as it expands its proprietary energy-trading business, even as other firms slow hiring in the space amid ebbing volatility.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后投资者从中国 ETF 撤回现金
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在大选中获胜，加剧了征收更严厉关税的风险，而刺激措施也未能让投资者相信中国能够经受住即将到来的风暴，因此，上周资金经理们从购买中国股票的交易所交易基金中撤出了现金。【原文：Money managers pulled cash from exchange-traded funds that buy Chinese stocks last week as Donald Trump’s election victory stoked the risk of tougher tariffs, while stimulus measures failed to reassure investors that China can weather the coming storm.】

item.title: 基辅推迟增税，IMF 开始审查乌克兰最新贷款
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）开始对其与乌克兰的贷款计划进行最新评估，而基辅却迟迟未能如贷款方所期望的那样通过税收立法。【原文：The International Monetary Fund began its latest assessment of its loan program with Ukraine, even as Kyiv delays passing tax legislation as the lender expects.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易员认为 S&P 年末涨势强于 2016 年
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The stock market could rally stronger into the end of the year following Republican Donald Trump’s presidential election victory than it did when he won the US presidency eight years ago, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s trading desk.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜，顶级黄金 ETF 创 2022 年以来最大单周流出量
item.description: 全球最大的黄金支持交易所交易基金上周录得两年多来最大的单周资金流出量，原因是唐纳德-特朗普在大选中的决定性胜利促使交易员们纷纷获利了结。【原文：The world’s largest gold-backed exchange traded fund recorded it biggest weekly outflow in more than two years last week as Donald Trump’s decisive election win prompted traders to book profits.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师坚持对美国国债持中性立场
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统大选和美联储（Federal Reserve）下调利率的竞争压力下，华尔街策略师对国债市场的建议持中性态度。【原文：Wall Street strategists are holding tight to neutral recommendations in the Treasury market amid competing forces of Donald Trump’s presidential victory and the Federal Reserve’s path toward lower interest rates.】

item.title: Blackstone 首席执行官对特朗普的押注得到回报，他的二号人物发挥了强大的对冲作用
item.description: 史蒂夫-施瓦茨曼（Steve Schwarzman）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的早期支持被证明是一个明智的赌注。【原文：Steve Schwarzman’s early endorsement of Donald Trump is proving to be a canny wager.】
